title: The Affair
description: You trusted her. You shouldn’t have.  Alicia’s been telling lies. And now they’ve come back to haunt her.  When an old colleague turns up at a party, Alicia comes face to face with the man who has the potential to ruin her perfect family life. He wouldn’t, would he?  In order to keep her secrets, Alicia has to tell yet more lies and when a devastating car accident makes the situation even more dangerous, it’s only a matter of time before everything falls apart. Can secrets really stay hidden forever?
author: Sheryl Browne
